00024 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 //Abstract File class
00026 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 class FileClass
00028 {
00029 public:
00030         //Destructor
00031         virtual ~FileClass() RX;
00032         //FileClass
00033         virtual const char* GetFileName() = 0;
00034         virtual const char* SetFileName(const char* pFileName) = 0;
00035         virtual int CreateFile() = 0;
00036         virtual int DeleteFile() = 0;
00037         virtual bool Exists(const char* pFileName) = 0; //If pFileName is NULL, use own.
00038         virtual bool HasHandle() = 0;
00039         virtual bool Open(eFileMode::FileAccess nFileMode) = 0;
00040         virtual bool OpenEx(const char* pFileName, eFileMode::FileAccess nFileAccess) = 0;
00041         virtual int ReadBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) = 0; //Returns number of bytes read.
00042         virtual int MoveFilePointer(int nDistance, eFileMode::MoveMethod nMoveMethod) = 0;
00043         virtual int GetFileSize() = 0;
00044         virtual int WriteBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) = 0; //Returns number of bytes written.
00045         virtual void Close() = 0;
00046         virtual DWORD GetFileTime() R0; //LoWORD = FatTime, HiWORD = FatDate
00047         virtual bool SetFileTime(DWORD FileTime) R0;
00048         virtual void CDCheck(DWORD dwUnk, DWORD dwUnk2, DWORD dwUnk3) = 0;
00049 
00050         FileClass() { };
00051 
00052         void * ReadWholeFile()
00053                 { JMP_THIS(0x4A3890); }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056         FileClass(bool) { }
00057 
00058         //Properties
00059 
00060 public:
00061 
00062         bool SkipCDCheck;
00063         int FileAccess;
00064 };
